io

Class WorldLoader

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.WorldLoader

  • public class WorldLoader
extends java.lang.Object
    Class used to load worlds from files. Each world is constructed by loading a .structure plain-text file, containing tile type id's from which a tile grid is generated, and a .entities file containing the world's serialized entities. This class is responsible for reading and interpreting each file and returning the parsed data for the game to use.

    • Method Detail

      • formatStructureFile

        private static int[] formatStructureFile(java.lang.String worldName)
                                  throws java.io.IOException,
                                         InvalidWorldFormatException
        Reads the .structure file of the specified world and splits the integers stored in it by space.
        Parameters:
        worldName - The name of the world whose file to load.
        Returns:
        An array of integers containing all the plain-text integers saved in this file.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If an I/O error occurs while reading from the appropriate file.
        InvalidWorldFormatException - If invalid data is read from the file.

      • loadWorldEntities

        public static java.util.Set<Entity> loadWorldEntities(java.lang.String worldName,
                                                      Tile[][] worldTiles)
                                               throws java.io.IOException,
                                                      java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
        Loads the entities for the specified world from the world's .entities file and places them in their corresponding tile.
        Parameters:
        worldName - The name of the world whose entities to load.
        worldTiles - The tile structure of this world to place Entities into.
        Returns:
        A Set with the loaded entities.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If an I/O error occurs while reading the appropriate file.
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException - If an invalid Object was saved in the file.

      • loadWorldStructure

        public static Tile[][] loadWorldStructure(java.lang.String worldName)
                                   throws java.io.IOException
        Loads the specified world's Tile structure from a plain-text .structure file.
        Parameters:
        worldName - The name of the world to load, WITHOUT the ".structure" extension.
        Returns:
        An array of arrays of Tiles that represent the world as described by the .structure file.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If an I/O error occurs while reading the appropriate file.
